title: The Mountie and the Rockhound
description: Republished as Melting the Minerals, February 25th 2008 by Total-E-Bound Publishing. Sergeant Trey MacKenzie, of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, never expected to end up waiting out a blizzard in his cabin with paleogeologist, Devin Wallace. But his rock collection provides a very unusual way for them to keep warm. Winter never sizzled like this!
author: C.S. Chatterly
